name: cross-poison
flavor_text: A slashing attack with a poisonous blade that may also poison the target. Critical hits land more easily.
effect_text_extend: Inflicts regular damage.  User's critical hit rate is one level higher when using this move. Has a 10% chance to poison the target.
effect_text_simple: Has an increased chance for a critical hit and a 10% chance to poison the target.
